inclusion.criterion: Cytogenetically documented Trisomy 21 or Complete Unbalanced Translocation of Chromosome 21.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No pregnancy by serum testing at screening.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory findings within normal limits or judged clinically insignificant at baseline.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Vital signs within normal limits for age. Stable, medically treated hypotension will be allowed.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ECG must demonstrate predominately normal sinus rhythm. Minor abnormalities documented as clinically insignificant will be allowed.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Participants and their authorized representatives will provide written informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participants who have received any experimental drug for Down syndrome must undergo a washout.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: All participants must: Be in general good health as judged by the investigators; Be able to swallow oral medication; Have a reliable caregiver or family member who agrees to accompany participant to all visits, provide information about the participant as required by the protocol, and ensure compliance with the medication schedule; Be sufficiently proficient in English (USA) or Portuguese (Brazil) to reliably complete the study assessments.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age and gender matching participants without Down syndrome, must be: Males or females without Down syndrome aged-matching (within 3 years) participants with Down syndrome whom they are expected to serve as controls.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Current psychiatric or neurologic diagnosis other than Down syndrome (e.g., major depressive disorder, schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, autism, Alzheimer disease)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Drug or alcohol abuse or dependence
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Significant suicide risk or who would require treatment with electro-convulsive therapy or with psychotropic drugs during the study or who have received treatment with a depot neuroleptic drug within 6 months of entering the study.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Current or expected (within the next 6 months) hospitalization or residence in a skilled nursing facility (may reside in group homes or other residential settings with no skilled nursing)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Active or clinically significant conditions affecting absorption, distribution, or metabolism of study drug (e.g. inflammatory bowel disease or celiac disease)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Significant allergies to or other significant intolerance of memantine therapy, its ingredients, or with contraindications to memantine therapy as stated in the prescribing information
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of Relapsing Remitting Multiple Sclerosis (RRMS) and is currently under treatment. She smokes 10 cigarettes per day and drinks alcohol occasionally.
